results.deck: Chomp your way to the top of the food chain in this frenetic fishy feeding frenzy from PopCap Games.  But don't let your guard down because there's always a bigger fish!
results.name: Feeding Frenzy

results.deck: Based on the animated motion picture, Bee Movie Game allows you to play as Barry B. Benson in a sandbox gameplay setting.
results.name: Bee Movie Game

results.deck: Based on the hit TV series Lost, Via Domus puts you in the shoes of an amnesiac survivor of Flight 815, who is struggling to remember his past while exploring the mysterious island he is on.
results.name: Lost: Via Domus

results.deck: BlackSite: Area 51 is a Sci-fi themed First-Person Shooter by Midway.
results.name: BlackSite: Area 51

results.deck: Fantasy shooter where players clear maze-like dungeons of monsters
results.name: Wizard of Wor

results.deck: The Club is an action game from Bizarre Creations which combines elements of third-person shooters and score-based arcade games.
results.name: The Club

results.deck: Take on the role of a soldier in the human Global Defense Force or the alien Strogg, and either save or devastate Earth in the process.
results.name: Enemy Territory: Quake Wars

results.deck: Blazing Angels 2: Secret Missions of WWII is the second game in the Blazing Angels series. It's an arcadey flight-action game similar to Crimson Skies.
results.name: Blazing Angels 2: Secret Missions of WWII

results.deck: Kameo: Elements of Power is a third person platformer that tells the story a young elf Kameo, who must regain her Elemental Powers, defeat her corrupted sister Kalus and her accomplice evil Troll King Thorn.
results.name: Kameo: Elements of Power

results.deck: In the seventh game in Namco Bandai's air combat series, and the first on next-gen consoles, you fight to defend the Republic of Emmeria from an invasion by forces from Estovakia.
results.name: Ace Combat 6: Fires of Liberation

results.deck: FIFA 08 is the 2008 installment of Electronic Arts' series of football video games. It was developed by EA Canada.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 08

results.deck: The Rise of Zilart is the first expansion in the Final Fantasy XI Online series.  It adds many new features such as three new jobs, new summonable avatars, over 30 new areas, new quests and missions.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online: Rise of Zilart
World Series of Poker: Tournament of Champions

results.deck: Virtua Tennis 3 is the third game in the Virtua Tennis franchise developed by Sega, featuring many of today's top professional players.
results.name: Virtua Tennis 3

results.deck: Developed by original Pac-Man creator Toru Iwatani, Pac-Man Championship Edition recreates the experience of the original but offers faster, time-limited gameplay with improved graphics and sound.
results.name: Pac-Man: Championship Edition

results.deck: Frontlines is a multiplayer-focused first person shooter with a strong political message from Kaos Studios. Kaos was previously responsible for Desert Combat, a popular mod for Battlefield 1942. The game is set in a global economic crisis in which oil is running out.
results.name: Frontlines: Fuel of War

results.deck: With dozens of parts to choose from, players are able to create their own giant mech. With a built in squad mechanic, Chromehounds' biggest draw was it's persistent online play.
results.name: Chromehounds

results.deck: Darkstar One is a space action-adventure with role-playing elements and an epic story.
results.name: Darkstar One

results.deck: The Project Gotham Racing franchise continues on the Xbox 360 as a launch title. The online play and focus on driving with style from the earlier games in the franchise remained, but the game saw a graphical leap and a different approach to content than its predecessor.
results.name: Project Gotham Racing 3

results.deck: A squad-based shooter centering around the uneasy alliance between ex-military mercenary Adam 'Kane' Marcus and the psychopathic James Lynch.
results.name: Kane & Lynch: Dead Men

results.deck: SEGA Rally Revo is an installment in the classic SEGA Rally series created for the PS3/360 generation of consoles, and is the last game from Sega Racing Studio before they were closed due to poor sales. It was released for the PC, Xbox 360, PS3 and PSP in late 2007.
results.name: Sega Rally Revo

results.deck: Travel the continent of Tamriel, defend the land against Oblivion's Daedra hordes,  and help fill the empty throne of Cyrodiil in the fourth installment of the Elder Scrolls series.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion

results.deck: Friend or Foe is a beat 'em up where Spider-Man teams up with his enemies to save the day and stop an unknown nemesis.
results.name: Spider-Man: Friend or Foe

results.deck: Join a frog-boy on an adventure to use his tongue to save his family.
results.name: Wik & The Fable of Souls

results.deck: Ratatouille is a game based on the film of the same name.
results.name: Ratatouille

results.deck: The Mortal Kombat and DC Comics universes collide in Midway's first crossover Mortal Kombat game developed for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe

results.deck: The fourth entry in EA Sport's boxing franchise and second release for the XBox 360 and PS3.
results.name: Fight Night Round 4

results.deck: Join 50 Cent and the G-Unit as they swear, ramp and rocket-launch their way around an unnamed Middle Eastern country in order to find out the answer to one specific question: "Where my skull?"
results.name: 50 Cent: Blood on the Sand

results.deck: Released to arcades in 2008 and later ported to consoles, Street Fighter IV updates the venerable series with 3D graphics and a retooled 2D fighting system based on Street Fighter II. Its popularity has sparked renewed interest in the genre, clearing the way for many other successful fighters.
results.name: Street Fighter IV

results.deck: Take on the role of Niko Bellic, a Serbian immigrant who comes to the US at his cousin Roman's request, to find a better life, search for "that special someone" and participate in lawless activities in an upgraded generation of Liberty City.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto IV

results.deck: Splinter Cell: Conviction is the fifth installment in Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell franchise. Sam Fisher breaks apart from the Third Echelon in order to find the people responsible for the death of his daughter, only to find that not everything is what it seems.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Conviction

results.deck: Ethan Thomas returns in Condemned 2: Bloodshot, a melee-focused first person horror game. Ethan battles with alcoholism and his own inner demons while tasked with a mystery surrounding the city's chaos and dark secrets behind a new epidemic.
results.name: Condemned 2: Bloodshot

results.deck: Enter the six-sided ring and wrestle in Midway's first wrestling game from the Orlando-based TNA wrestling promotion.
results.name: TNA iMPACT!

results.deck: Bionic Commando is the follow-up to the NES classic of the same name. The game revolves around the protagonist's bionic arm used for swinging, and combat.
results.name: Bionic Commando

results.deck: Sega and Eurocom's official Olympics game for the 2008 event in Beijing.
results.name: Beijing 2008: The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games

results.deck: A canceled role-playing game by Obsidian, based on the Alien franchise.
results.name: Aliens RPG

results.deck: A reboot of the Alone in the Dark series, once again following Edward Carnby in his fight against the vile creatures of the darkness.
results.name: Alone in the Dark

results.deck: America's Army: True Soldiers is a military simulation like is predecessor
results.name: America's Army: True Soldiers

results.deck: Army of Two sets players as two metal clad "mercs" in the modern day Iraq war.  Co-op tactics, swift maneuvers and upgraded weapons are necessary to fulfill your contracts and get paid.
results.name: Army of Two

results.deck: Battlestations Pacific is the sequel to Battlestations Midway, set during World War II
results.name: Battlestations: Pacific

results.deck: Become Beowulf in this hack and slash video game based off of the movie. Slay Grendel and his mother with the help of your loyal Thanes and a healthy dose of quick time events.
results.name: Beowulf: The Game

results.deck: Borderlands is a first-person shooter RPG from Gearbox Software that puts players into the shoes of one of four playable characters as they traverse the hostile planet of Pandora in search of a mysterious "Vault", said to contain priceless unknown riches and alien technologies.
results.name: Borderlands

results.deck: Become Jason Bourne as he tries to outrun government assassins and discover the secrets of his past.
results.name: Robert Ludlum's The Bourne Conspiracy

results.deck: Kane's Wrath expands on the events before, during and after the events of Command & Conquer: Tiberium Wars with a new campaign, as well as the all-new Global Domination mode and a range of sub-factions and new units to fight with or against.
results.name: Command & Conquer 3: Kane's Wrath

results.deck: Use your glaive to chop off your enemies' heads in this third-person action-shooter from D3 and Digital Extremes.
results.name: Dark Sector

results.deck: In this action-RPG from Silicon Knights, players take on the role of the Norse god Baldur, whose protective feelings towards Humanity and refusal to augment his body with cybernetics lead the other Aesir to label him "too Human".
results.name: Too Human

results.deck: The Dragon Ball Z universe makes its first appearance on the seventh generation of consoles with the release of Dragon Ball Z: Burst Limit.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Burst Limit

results.deck: In Bethesda's first-person revival of the classic post-apocalyptic RPG series, the player is forced to leave Vault 101 and venture out into the irradiated wasteland of Washington D.C. to find his or her father.
results.name: Fallout 3

results.deck: An action-oriented role-playing game set 500 years after the original Fable, this sequel starts players out in the role of a street urchin destined for greatness.
results.name: Fable II

results.deck: Set in 2161, global warming has caused the U.S. to split into two. Fracture tells the story of Jet Brody, a soldier for the Atlantic Alliance (the former East Coast), as he fights the Republic of Pacifica (the former West Coast) led by former Alliance General Sheridan.
results.name: Fracture

results.deck: Fight off the other animals to become the next leader in this politically-charged minigame collection from Gamecock.
results.name: Hail to the Chimp

results.deck: Halo Wars is a real-time strategy game for the Xbox 360. Join the Halo Wars crew on the UNSC ship CFV-88 Spirit of Fire and engage the Covenant head-on in an attempt to hold on to the recently taken human colony of Harvest. All Units!
results.name: Halo Wars

results.deck: The classic Marvel superhero Iron Man steps into the world of video games in his own game based on the hit blockbuster film.
results.name: Iron Man

results.deck: Circle of Doom marks the Kingdom Under Fire series' first release on the Xbox 360. With this release, they changed the series' gameplay formula to focus on the hack-and-slash RPG aspects.
results.name: Kingdom Under Fire: Circle of Doom

results.deck: When Pandora's Box is accidentally opened, first person shooting commences in an array of cities, sewers and subways as you fend off destructive mythical creatures.
results.name: Legendary

results.deck: Take control of Indiana Jones and play through the first three original films, Lego style!
results.name: LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures

results.deck: Colonies Edition adds new multiplayer content and a handful of additional single-player modes to Capcom's snowy third-person shooter.
results.name: Lost Planet: Extreme Condition - Colonies Edition

results.deck: Play as Vito Scaletta and rise up through the ranks of the criminal underworld of Empire Bay in Mafia II, the sequel to the 2002 sandbox-style hit.
results.name: Mafia II

results.deck: EA Sports is back with NCAA March Madness 08, featuring Texas Freshamn Standout Kevin Durant on the cover.
results.name: NCAA March Madness 08

results.deck: The sequel to Ninja Gaiden; A high-difficulty, ninja-themed, hack-and-slash title.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden II

results.deck: Operation Darkness is a turn-based strategy RPG which follows the exploits of a supernatural special forces unit during World War II as they attempt to stop Hitler and his various occult minions.
results.name: Operation Darkness

results.deck: Resident Evil 5 follows series alum Chris Redfield as he journeys into West Africa with his new partner, Sheva Alomar, fighting Las Plagas-infested enemies called the Majini.
results.name: Resident Evil 5

results.deck: Sabotage the brutal Nazi regime in this World War II stealth action game inspired by a real-life British secret agent.
results.name: Velvet Assassin

results.deck: Section 8 is a Sci-Fi first-person shooter that allows players to dynamically alter the flow of combat utilizing tactical assets and on-demand vehicle delivery. Your mission is to scout and secure difficult locations using the most advanced arsenal of military hardware known to man.
results.name: Section 8

results.deck: Classic Sega characters collide on the courts in this arcade-style tennis game.
results.name: Sega Superstars Tennis

results.deck: The long-running Civilization series of strategy games makes a brief (yet smooth) transition to both video game consoles and handheld devices with Civilization Revolution.
results.name: Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution

results.deck: Electronic Arts follows up to the hugely successful Sims 2 with an improved character creation system, an open neighborhood, and a greater focus on character development.
results.name: The Sims 3

results.deck: Sonic the Hedgehog debuts on the Xbox 360 and Playstation 3 in this realism-focused former-reboot.
results.name: Sonic the Hedgehog

results.deck: Nuts & Bolts takes the platformer series in a wild new direction, as Banjo and Kazooie return to battle Gruntilda using unique, player-customized vehicles.
results.name: Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts

results.deck: Spectral Forces 3 is a tactical RPG with several interesting game mechanics and dozens of characters to recruit into your ranks.
results.name: Spectral Force 3

results.deck: Hack thousands of foes into pieces while rage against Hel's forces in this third-person action game from Creative Assembly.
results.name: Viking: Battle for Asgard

results.deck: Set in between Star Wars Episodes III and IV, Force Unleashed casts the player as Darth Vader's secret apprentice tasked with hunting down the last of the Jedi Order.
results.name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed

results.deck: DDR UNIVERSE 3 is the third entry to the UNIVERSE franchise on the U.S. Xbox 360, adding a new DJ mode while revamping its arcade and quest modes.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution UNIVERSE 3

results.deck: While not a tie-in to Hellboy II: The Golden Army, players can control Hellboy, Abe Sapien, and Liz Sherman. The game came with a free movie ticket for the film, and featured the voices of Ron Perlman, Doug Jones and Selma Blair.
results.name: Hellboy: The Science of Evil

results.deck: Konami is getting back into the guitar and drums market with an all-new rhythm game called Rock Revolution.
results.name: Rock Revolution

results.deck: This installment of Silent Hill sees a new character, Alex Shepherd, returning home from military service to find his family in disarray. To save his brother, Josh, he must enter the macabre town of Silent Hill.
results.name: Silent Hill: Homecoming

results.deck: What happened in Vegas stayed in Vegas, when Midway canceled this rambunctious open-world game centered on fighting, dancing, gambling, and street racing.
results.name: This Is Vegas

results.deck: Kung Fu Panda tells the story of Po, a panda who is chosen to be the Dragon Warrior and the trials he faces on his hero's journey. This game features beat 'em- up elements as well as impressive graphics.
results.name: Kung Fu Panda

results.deck: The venerable Battlefield franchise returns for its second console-only outing, this time with a fleshed out single player campaign and a new multiplayer game mode, Gold Rush.
results.name: Battlefield: Bad Company

results.deck: Turn back the clock yet again in EALA's third installment of the popular alternate-historical RTS, Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3.
results.name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3

results.deck: Skate 2 adds additional trick modifiers, a wide-open career mode, and a host of new multiplayer content to the original Skate formula.
results.name: Skate 2

results.deck: Join Delta Squad once more in the fight against the Locust Horde, in this "bigger, better and more badass" sequel to the 2006 smash hit.
results.name: Gears of War 2

results.deck: Project Origin is the direct sequel to Monolith's spooky first-person shooter, F.E.A.R.
results.name: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin

results.deck: This entry into the Final Fantasy universe is set in the worlds of Pulse and Cocoon. Players take control of multiple characters who are caught in a war between these worlds.
results.name: Final Fantasy XIII

results.deck: The sequel to the original Far Cry dispenses with Jack Carver, and moves the action to a war-consumed Africa complete with an open-ended storyline involving civil war, several hours of missions, heated gunplay, and a slew of dynamic elements powered by a new engine.
results.name: Far Cry 2

results.deck: A game released by Burger King in which the player assumes the role of The King. The goal of the game is to creepily sneak up on unsuspecting people of lower socioeconomic backgrounds and present them with various items from the Burger King menu.
results.name: Sneak King

results.deck: Tom Clancy's HAWX put the player in a variety of aircraft and their goal is to defend various countries from foreign attack
results.name: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X

results.deck: id Software's Rage combines first-person shooting, vehicular action, and "open but directed" exploration to tell the story of Earth's wretched civilization after a cataclysmic meteor strike. Militaristic authority figures, freedom-fighting rebels, criminal raiders, and twisted mutants battle each other for control of the barren wasteland Earth has become.
results.name: Rage

results.deck: The fourth game in the Guitar Hero series adds drums and vocals to the mix, along with a music studio that you can use to create new tracks and share them online.
results.name: Guitar Hero World Tour

results.deck: Don King Presents: Prizefighter is a boxing for the XBOX 360.
results.name: Don King Presents: Prizefighter

results.deck: Soulcalibur IV is the fifth installment in Namco's Soul series of weapon-based fighting games, and the first to be released on seventh-generation consoles. It features Darth Vader (PS3), Yoda (360), and the Apprentice from Star Wars as guest characters.
results.name: Soulcalibur IV

results.deck: The clone that surpassed the original returns with the even more over-the-top sequel to Volition's popular open-world mayhem generator, Saints Row.
results.name: Saints Row 2

results.deck: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2009 continues with its annual edition of the popular wrestling game with its tenth game. The 2009 edition puts additional focus on tag team wrestling, including a co-operative story mode.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2009

results.deck: Viva Piñata: Trouble in Paradise realistically simulates everyday struggles in the life of an omnipresent piñata handler.
results.name: Viva Piñata: Trouble in Paradise

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Aerosmith puts the player in the shoes of "America's Greatest Rock and Roll Band" as they evolve from unknowns to rock superstars. In a guitar hero game dedicated to the band that is Aerosmith!
results.name: Guitar Hero: Aerosmith

results.deck: Chosen One is the third game in Midway's NBA Ballers series.
results.name: NBA Ballers: Chosen One

results.deck: With a script edited and approved by Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis, Ghostbusters: The Video Game is a sequel to the feature length films. Who ya gonna call? GHOSTBUSTERS!
results.name: Ghostbusters: The Video Game

results.deck: Left 4 Dead puts players in the role of one of four survivors during a zombie apocalypse. Survivors will depend on co-operation to get from one safe house to another, while facing hordes of "Infected", four of which can be controlled by human players in certain game modes.
results.name: Left 4 Dead

results.deck: With an improved graphics engine, Lara Croft is back and is looking better than ever. This time around she'll be going on an adventure to find the sacred Mayan underworld of Xibalba in Southern Mexico.
results.name: Tomb Raider: Underworld

results.deck: Proving Ground took the Tony Hawk series to the East Coast while breaking skater classes down into three specific styles of play.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Proving Ground
